priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire SOAPP-R Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100160

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire SOAPP-R Test Code Terminology

definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised test code.
name: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire SOAPP-R Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you have mood swings?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Mood Swings

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a need for higher doses of medication to treat your pain?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Need Higher Doses of Medication

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt impatient with your doctors?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Impatient With Doctors

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt that things are just too overwhelming that you can't handle them?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt That Things Are Overwhelming

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often is there tension in the home?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Tension at Home

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you counted pain pills to see how many are remaining?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Counted Pain Pills

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been concerned that people will judge you for taking pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Concerned People Will Judge You

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often do you feel bored?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Feel Bored

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you taken more pain medication than you were supposed to?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Taken More Pain Medication
synonyms: SOAPR1-How Often Taken More Pain Med

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you worried about being left alone?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Worried About Being Left Alone

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt a craving for medication?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Craving for Medication

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others expressed concern over your use of medication?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Expressed Concern Over Medication Use

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have any of your close friends had a problem with alcohol or drugs?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Friends Had Problem

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others told you that you had a bad temper?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Told You Bad Temper

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you felt consumed by the need to get pain medication?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Felt Consumed to Get Pain Medication
synonyms: SOAPR1-Felt Consumed to Get Pain Med

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you run out of pain medication early?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Run Out of Pain Medication Early
synonyms: SOAPR1-Run Out of Pain Med Early

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others kept you from getting what you deserve?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Kept You From what You Deserve

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often, in your lifetime, have you had legal problems or been arrested?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Legal Problems or Arrested

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you attended an AA or NA meeting?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Attended AA or NA Meeting

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been in an argument that was so out of control that someone got hurt?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Argument Where Someone Got Hurt

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been sexually abused?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Sexually Abused

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have others suggested that you have a drug or alcohol problem?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Others Suggested Drug or Alcohol Problem

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you had to borrow pain medications from your family or friends?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - How Often Borrowed Pain Medication

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - How often have you been treated for an alcohol or drug problem?
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Treated for Alcohol or Drug Problem
synonyms: SOAPR1-Treated for Alcohol or Drug Prob

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - Please include any additional information you wish about the above answers.
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Any Additional Information

terms.definition: Screener and Opioid Assessment for Patients with Pain - Revised - Score.
terms.preferredTerm: SOAPP-R - Score
